alert.note: Alert for Colfax; Harding; Mora (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 4:51PM MDT until July 05 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN HARDING...NORTHEASTERN MORA AND SOUTHEASTERN COLFAX COUNTIES... At 451 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mills, or 23 miles southeast of Springer, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Abbott, Mills and Chicosa Lake State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. High winds and large hail can spread quickly across open rangeland.
